Stack Container
===============

The Stack container module holds a list of elements. Elements are added
to the top of the stack, and retrieved from the top of the stack (FIFO).

List of Functions
-----------------
* :func:`Stack() <containers.stack.Stack>`
* :func:`clear() <containers.stack.Stack.clear>`
* :func:`isEmpty() <containers.stack.Stack.isEmpty>`
* :func:`peek() <containers.stack.Stack.peek>`
* :func:`pop() <containers.stack.Stack.pop>`
* :func:`push(value) <containers.stack.Stack.push>`

.. automodule:: containers.stack
    :members:
    :undoc-members:
    :show-inheritance:
